title: Mass for quake victims held in Mexico City
description:
(24 Sep 2017) Mexicans attended Mass in Mexico City on Sunday as the search for survivors of the deadly 7.1 earthquake continued. 
People filled the pews at the Basilica of Our Lady of Guadalupe as cardinal Norberto Rivera remembered those who died during Tuesday's quake.
The cardinal addressed the large image of the Virgin of Guadalupe, the patron saint of Mexico, as he gave Mass. 
Mexican authorities said the death toll from Tuesday's magnitude 7.1 earthquake had reached 318, with more than half of those in the capital.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/08a9cd8b1f4eeab9c76f22b45faaccf8 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
